sentence:
After 2 days, the patient’s body temperature was normal and she was discharged from hospital.Results
After culturing for 48 h, gray, translucent, smooth, slightly raised colonies with a diameter of 0.5–1 mm were visible without a hemolytic ring (Figure 1).
The gram staining results showed a positive bacillus (Figure 2).
The MALDI-TOF MS of the isolated strain was most homologous to C. cadaveris with a confidence level of 99.9% (Figure 3).
By constructing a phylogenetic tree, it is found that that isolate was located in the same branch as C. cadaveris (Figure 4).

Open in a new tab
Result of pure culture of the bacterial isolate after 48 h.Figure 2.

Open in a new tab
Gram staining of the bacterial isolate.Figure 3.

Open in a new tab
Mass spectra of the bacterial isolate.Figure 4.

Results
After culturing for 48 h, gray, translucent, smooth, slightly raised colonies with a diameter of 0.5–1 mm were visible without a hemolytic ring (Figure 1).
The gram staining results showed a positive bacillus (Figure 2).
The MALDI-TOF MS of the isolated strain was most homologous to C. cadaveris with a confidence level of 99.9% (Figure 3).
By constructing a phylogenetic tree, it is found that that isolate was located in the same branch as C. cadaveris (Figure 4).

The gram staining results showed a positive bacillus (Figure 2).
The MALDI-TOF MS of the isolated strain was most homologous to C. cadaveris with a confidence level of 99.9% (Figure 3).
By constructing a phylogenetic tree, it is found that that isolate was located in the same branch as C. cadaveris (Figure 4).
